This is getting scarey, and you liberals are XXXXXXX me off! Saddam has 7 Drones, that are computer generated, and are pointed at the US. These drones are loaded with chemical weapons. According to the UN, we cannot destroy them until they enter our air space. (the UN is a pain in the a$$) If we do that (obviously) the chemicals will be in our air space! Our government knows what is going on, they are trying not to scare you poor little liberals with this. The question I'm asking is...
 Why do you want to risk your lives? 
 Bush is concerned about the innocent people over there in Iraq, but Saddam, doesn't give a flying f *** about us!
I hadn't heard about this, can you give me a source?

computer generated? Do you mean computer guided?
 
 And these drones can make it all the way from Iraq to here?

http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,79472,00.html
 It was on the news. The reason we are in such danger is because we don't attack. Thanks to all the people who don't want war, every minute we sit back and wait, our situation grows worse.

FOX. I wouldn't let my pet watch FOX. Sara notice the might's, could's, maybe's, andmay's every other word. None of this is proven, speculation. Iraq COULD have drones, and they COULD manage to get one to America (how they could get a drone with a 210 mile range across a thousand miles of ocean is beyond me). This is bullcrap...you're being controlled by fear (cover your houses with plastic wrap and duct tape). The best way to keep a person's mind off of what is actually relevant and important is to scare them. This story is complete speculation.
 
 Don't ever watch FOX news, it's a joke.

I'll have to agree with thistown. China could do the same thing. should we invade them? (personally, i might say yes.. :D)
 
 Actually, NBC (nuclear, biological, and chemical) attacks are more "terror" than we realize. They aren't as lethal as you may think. The possibility of Saddam's UAVs appearing in American skies IS a possibility, but so is the chance of Japan getting nuked by N.K.

i am for the war vs. iraq, and i still think the drone thing is a joke. No one in the pentagon or CIA really believes that. The U.S. cannot maintain Predator drones over afghanistan, but you think some crappy Iraqi drone is going to fly from the Middle East to the United States??? And what motivation would Saddam Hussein ever have to use them against us? He isn't stupid. We have thousands of nuclear weapons. and Fox news is retarded

So lets just put all of the coulds, and maybes aside and sing happy songs in hopes that Saddam changes his heart and mind.
 It could be a lie, but I seriously doubt it. I don't want to take the chance, and die from some chemical because we had no real proof of whether or not he had it in the first place. Yeah, you are right, I'm scared! Not ducktape scared, but scared! I'm scared that we may decide to not go to war, and we get struck again losing more lives!!
P.S. fox news is mostly conservatives, that's why you guys don't agree with it.

No FOX news is a joke. It's so full of censorship and propaganda I stopped watching it. Yes it is conservative, and I don't mind that. But when a political view affects the quality of the news to the extent that FOX lets it, I say we need to draw a line. The bias they let bleed over into the "facts" is insane.
 
 No news source is completely neutral, but at least they try to a certain extent. Why do you think FOX reported that drone thing they way they did, they wanted to scare people, it brings ratings up. So they bend the truth to make a near-impossible scenario sound like it is a ever increasing possibility. They lied to you. FOX has realized that people don't want the truth, they want scandal, deceit, and what Michael Jackson's nose looks like, and instead of making some attempt to stick to the truth they have bent over to make more money.
 
 I hate FOX news.

I didn't mean we should sit back and let whatever happen. But sometimes the possibility of something happening doesn't justify us taking such strong action. Now we should prepare for that possibility, but I don't think it's wise to worry about it. 
 
 I don't think that possibility you mentioned is reason enough to go to war.

sarah,
 
 just because the news reported something -- with zero proof and all conjecture -- does not mean we should go to war. think about it: the bush team is really looking for strong arguments to go to war...if there was something at all to this drone thing don't you think they would say more about it, as opposed to you hearing it from Fox news? by the way, I hate Fox news, and i DO think we shoudl go to war with Iraq, just for other reasons less dumb than this one...

Hold up! There is a lot of tape of testing of these vehicles. We KNOW he has them. 
 
 And FOX is the highest rated cable news network. MSNBC is a joke, and CNN is struggling. 
 
 Drones are easily deployed. All you have to do is crate it and off it goes. al Queda has a navy...stick it on a ship, sail to the US marine border, launch the drone.
Yeah you are right and MSNBC IS a joke.:)

The fact that something is the highest rated mean absolutely nothing to me. For God's Sake "Joe Millionaire" was the number one rated show in America, what does that tell you. And of course it is the highest rated...it's more of a sopa opera than the news and they know what sells.
I'd say it's balanced prgramming...the anchors are a political mix. If people don't really care for the network I'd think they'd go to a slanted network...they haven't.

sorry guys, i'm an anti-war type of girl! i know that if we just sat here and did nothing the saddam would probabaly launch another terriorist attack on the us but, why waste millions of lives attacking a county that has millions of inoccent people that are living in it just to get at two people, saddam and bin laden?emoticon_confused why can't we just go into iraq and try and find bin laden? i know you're not allowed to shoot saddam in iraq unless you're at war or something but can't you just figure out something that would save millions of lives and get saddam at the same time?
We're saving millions by going in! We have killed fewer people, about 200 according to Iraq, in a week than he kills, if made into a steady rate, daily. (205 every day of every year for two decades.)

Sadam and Binladen are the type of people who like to use innocents as sheilds..... If we have to take the lives of innocents over there to save innocents over here the we must do what we must do. Nobody wants war....... but common sense says we have to protect ourselves.
Don't put those two in the same sentence, they have absolutely nothing to do with each other.

Agreed. The terror ties are only growing... and now the Iraqi Intelligence agents arrested plotting against our embassies... that's enough.
